feed.title: Habitica Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.32.5 Wiki Link Revisions
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Fix: Update or remove several links to unmaintained Fandom wiki (@SabreCat)
  • Fix: Add bottom margin to div with toggle button in Equipment view (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.33.0 February Content 2025
entry.content:
API

  • Feature: Revised, more generous contributor rewards (@phillipthelen)
  • Content: Routine item additions for February 2025, including pets and subcriber items (@CuriousMagpie)
  • Docs: Update API usage guidelines link in apidoc (@SabreCat)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Feature: Add Bluesky link to footer (@phillipthelen)
  • Fix: Add jQuery to webpack to correct console errors during Justin tutorials (@rafJagCode)
  • Fix: Revise outdated links in footer, 404, and Contact Us pages (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.33.1 Promotion Date Revisions
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Minor revisions to timing of gifting and Gem discount promos (@SabreCat)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.33.2 More Wiki Link Fixes
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Fix: Several more links to outdated Fandom wiki replaced or removed (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.33.3 Fixes
entry.content:
Server

  • Feature: Add SLOW_REQUEST_THRESHOLD env option to send activity that drags past the given processing time to logger service (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Feature: Upgrade Enchanted Armoire icon to animated, componentized sprite (@phillipthelen)
  • Fix: NPC and Kickstarter achievements display correctly in admin panel (@phillipthelen)
  • Fix: Use correct permissions.news flag for determining whether to show news drafts (@phillipthelen)
